MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Owley Wood Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.12PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damage caused to our underground cable, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.10PM on 1st February 2021
